Description_lang: Protect an ally with $n explosive dragonscales, increasing their Armor by $<perc>% of your own.Melee attacks against the target cause 1 scale to explode, dealing $<dmg> Volcanic damage to enemies near them. This damage can only occur every few sec.Blistering Scales can only be placed on one target at a time. Casts on your enemy's target if they have one.
AuraDescription_lang: $?$w1>0[Armor increased by $w1.][Armor increased by $w2%.] Melee attacks against you have a chance to cause an explosion of Volcanic damage.
